Patch Notes Maintenance 08.11

TLR :
1. Marina Side Story
2.Gacha : Barina
3.More packs for whale , (casual spender like me is not interested in any)
4. Some Costume in Shop
5.Guardian Pass : Karina 👌
6.Fix bugs as always .

___________
Full detail :
*The details of these patch notes are subject to change to reflect with the live server.

1. Event
- Live Event: 21 Kanterbury Street Start!
ㄴEvent time: August 11th After Server Maintenance ~ August 25th (14 days)
ㄴChallenge stage open time: August 18th
ㄴReward exchange end time: September 1st
ㄴEvent mission end time: August 25th
ㄴBonus point Hero: Grand Admiral Marina(x1.5), Flower Girl Bari(x1.2), White Beast(x1.2), Rachel(x1.2), Male Knight/Female Knight(x1.2)

ㄴ6 Story stages, 4 Sub stages, 6 Event rift stages
ㄴEvent mission, accumulate event points to unlock rewards
ㄴEvent mission details:
- Event mission, spend stamina to unlock a costume
- Event stage clear mission
- Event clear mission with specific Heroes

- Hero Pickup event
ㄴ Event time : August 11th After Server Maintenance ~August 25th (14 days)
ㄴ Hero Pickup 1 : ★★★ Grand Admiral Marina
ㄴ Hero Pickup 2 : ★★★ Flower Girl Bari
- Equipment Pickup Event
ㄴ Event time : August 11th After Server Maintenance ~August 25th (14 days)
ㄴ Equipment Pickup 1 : ★★★★★ Armada
ㄴ Equipment Pickup 2 : ★★★★★ Mayreel
2. Shop
- New Packages added.
ㄴ Awakening Stones Everyday! Package(30 Days)
ㄴ Grow Boost! Super Awakening Package
ㄴ Unique Hero Growth Package(Goddess of War Plitvice)
ㄴ Unique Hero Growth Package(Knight Lady Lapice)
ㄴ Unique Hero Growth Package(Executive Red Hood Arabelle)
ㄴ Unique Hero Growth Package(Idol Captain Eva)
ㄴ Unique Hero Growth Package(Ice Witch Lupina)
ㄴ Unique Hero Growth Package(Scrivener Lahn)
ㄴ Unique Hero Growth Package(Movie Star Eugene)
ㄴ Unique Hero Growth Package(Grand Admiral Marina)
ㄴ Unique Hero Growth Package(Flower Girl Bari)
* Awakening Stones Everyday! Package(30 Days) and Grow Boost! Super Awakening Package will be displayed after clearing the Desert of Madness world.
* Grow Boost! Super Awakening Package can be purchased 4 times in 2 weeks.
* After summon, the Unique Hero Growth Package will be displayed if you have that hero, only if the amount of evolution stones required to evolve the hero is less than the number of evolution stones in the package.
* The Unique Hero Growth Package is available to purchase for 7 days from the time of initial display and will not be displayed to the store again after 7 days without purchase.

- Changed the costumes in the shop:
ㄴ Pilot Marina
ㄴ Plague Doctor Karina
ㄴ Plague Doctor (Knight)
ㄴ Steampunk Hero Shapira
ㄴ Toy Block Bari
ㄴ Racer Marianne
ㄴ Toy-gun Hekate
ㄴ Doll White Beast
3. Guardian Pass 2020 Season 3
ㄴ Season time: August 25th ~ September 21st (Based on Server time)
ㄴ Main reward: Exclusive Weapon of Vampire Girl Karina ★★★★ Crescent Moon

4. Fixes and Improvements
- Fixed the issue where your character stops if an opponent disconnects in Arena.
- Fixed the issue where the game did not end when the match resulted in a draw in Arena.
- Fixed the issue where chain skills did not activate correctly when using the gamepad, caused the game to crash.
- Improved the hacking defense system of the game.
- Fixed the issue that the chat window (speech bubble) does not disappear quickly in the tutorial escape scene.
- Fixed the issue that the Exclusive Weapon that cannot yet be acquired appear in the Hero book.
- Fixed the issue of the missing difficulty mark of the nightmare stage.
- Improved heroes AI to reduce the stuck on wall issue.
